about.metaDescription: I am a frontend engineer focused on React and TypeScript, with strong interest in web performance and user experience.

profile.name: Younghoon Kim
profile.summaryPrefix: I am a frontend engineer focused on React, TypeScript, and Next.js. I have worked on stabilizing user flows under high traffic, performance optimization, and legacy migrations. I have contributed to open source projects including TanStack Query and React Router with
profile.summaryHighlight: 10 merged PRs included in official releases

ea.role: Frontend Engineer — FC Online Operations Tool
ea.highlight1: Reduced weekly QA reproduction/log request tickets from 10 to 3 by syncing URL state.
ea.highlight2: After redesigning the item version-management flow, similar deployment issues dropped to zero.
ea.highlight3: Owned the end-to-end frontend workflow (stack selection, QA collaboration, and documentation).

nhn.highlight1: Built reservation flows for large-traffic events such as KBO Opening Day and the Korean Series.
nhn.highlight2: Unified JSP-based multilingual pages into a single React + i18next codebase (2 -> 1).
nhn.highlight3: Blocked non-eligible users from entering booking flows via fan-club-tier and team-policy filtering.

pandora.highlight1: Improved Lighthouse SEO score from 56 to 82 using dynamic meta injection in EJS templates.
pandora.highlight2: Developed a hybrid-app WebView flow for community and product purchase journeys.
pandora.highlight3: Proposed and implemented @mention support end-to-end, including notification integration.

query.pr1Title: Optimized useQueries from O(N²) to O(N)
query.pr1Desc: Reduced function calls in the 500-query benchmark from 4,500 to 2,000 (~55%).
query.pr2Desc: Resolved stale UI after page refresh.
query.pr3Desc: Stabilized mismatch in Nx Cloud distributed execution config.

router.pr2Desc: Added safe handling for session save failures in private mode.
router.pr3Desc: Added regression tests for SSR environments.
router.pr5Desc: Addressed CDN CORS CSS preload issues.

rhf.pr1Desc: Resolved never-lock issue and added type tests.

tsr.pr1Desc: Changed 500 to 404 behavior and added tests.

meta.homeDescription: Personal engineering blog about React, TypeScript, and web performance optimization.
meta.blogDescription: Technical posts on frontend engineering, React, TypeScript, and web performance.
meta.postFallbackDescription: Personal engineering blog by Younghoon Kim.
